website_summaries.verdict: A good WiFi capable projector that comes at a decent price.
pros: Compatible with Apple or Android devices
Comes with a setup for tripod mounting
cons: The speakers can be a little tricky to figure out depending on the device you are using

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Best
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to set up the machine. Connect to the projector and then connect to the wifi. Easy!! It’s the best I’ve ever used. Picture is clear and it has a good sound effect. It’s good to use at home and work because it can be connectted to my iPhone and Mac easily. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Lots of functions in small package !!
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector that does what you need. Light weight and lesser noise with Dual-speaker in a small package. The best function with this is the WiFi that let you connect any sources to this projector. Loving it and will getting another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Set this unit up in less than 10 min. Connected Ipad Air2 and Iphone 6s and an android tablet to it in a few more, and they all worked flawlessly. A very nice unit for the price. Would definitely recommend this to a friend. Very fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robert Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as described. I was able to contact customer service for troubleshooting tips and they were able to resolve my issue with playing videos through WiFi. The wireless connectivity is exactly what I needed. Very helpful and friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Uknurse2006

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: The projector is compact and easy to operate. The additional cords that accompanied the projector were a plus even though I plan to use the WiFi feature most of the time. The remote control works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but surprisingly good + Wifi
customer_reviews.text: This projector is more than I expected from the small form factor - like all projectors in this category (compact) they work best in complete darkness or at least at a moderate low-light setting. This one comes with it's own Wifi so that you can can go wireless if you want, I only went as far as "Screen Mirroring" with my iPhone and it worked as advertised. I like to wire my connections. If your looking for a compact projector with just enough feature including Wifi, you should gives this one try.
customer_reviews.author: William Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I just got the projector and I wanted to try it out. It was easy enough to use with my phone. I have movies downloaded through the Movies Anywhere app, i used miracast through the phone, and it worked great. I didn't even connect the projector to the wifi network , just to the phone. The speakers were better than i thought they would be. It even comes with a HDMI cable. I am definitely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I've been out of town, but was overjoyed when my projector was waiting on me yesterday. It worked the first time I hooked it up and does the job I wanted. All I need now is a case for it to be totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for price
customer_reviews.text: Best product for price you pay, i didn't expect this good quality. Sound is somewhat low but you can connect speaker. I did had some hickup with Netflix though, but that seems to be due to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  Wireless is not an option unless you want to mess up your network
customer_reviews.text: Although the picture was nice, we tried to use the device wirelessly (so that we could connect to our iPhone), but the directions were not clear and you had to rename your wireless network, password and phone! Not a good way for a device to connect to the projector. We ended up spending two hours undoing the "damage" to our network and phones. We ended up using a HDMI connection to our mac, but then could not use our bluetooth speaker. Would not recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and really cool
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up, Randy says, but we still haven't been able to figure out how to get the sound to come out of it. Last nite we screened a Netflix selection on the wall. It was about climbers in Yosemite so the BIG images of Halfdome and El Capitan were perfect, except we had to listen to the sound coming out of the laptop. Hopefully we'll figure how to get the sound soon! I think this unit is good value for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani D. Lesh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to connect wireless!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in Hope to enjoy movies with our family. The set up was not easy.!!! I tried on an android and iPhone. I called Amazon support and ended up having to get Samsung ( my phone manufacturer) help. The You Tube videos on this projector were misleading...Once I finally got the connection..My Netflix would not stream and anothet series of phone calls after long days of work. I then get information that Netflix does not support the device... Returning the projector after 2 weeks wasted energy trying to connect and not enjoying time with family at home but rather in a theater....The speaker quality which is not an option to review , it was trash too!!!.
customer_reviews.author: kristina W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: With my iPhone 8: -Over WiFi, Netflix and Hulu won’t work. Now, I have read this is is a problem with Netflix and Hulu, NOT the projector. These streaming services block their content when using airplay. -Using an Apple brand HDMI to usb-c, Netflix has picture, but no sound. Hulu has sound, but no picture. (I tested this adapter on my TV and everything worked fine, so it’s the projector.) -The only way I can watch Netflix on the projector is with my laptop. Which is fine, but I like the convenience of plugging in my phone which is a smaller device.
customer_reviews.author: Bobmma

customer_reviews.title: Big black dot on the left side of screen
customer_reviews.text: What I this like about this projector is that with in 5 minutes of now done hooking up everything there's a big black dot on the left side of the screen...
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item while it was on sale. Though I opened the package to check for damage and confirm everything was sent immediately, I did not use the projector for the first time until after a few months after I purchased it. Boy, I should have done this immediately as the picture quality is awful. Very blurry anything over 5 feet from screen. At that distance, it completely eliminates using this projector for movies, PPT's, or anything you would want greater than a 36" view of inside or outside. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and it does not work straight out the box! I black dot "grew" from the center of the picture out and then shut off. Like it was burning and getting hot. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 projectors. This one and one other are mini projectors for Halloween props. I only bought this model for 720P and better brightness vs my other mini that is 800 x 400. This projector will only project about a 100 inch screen. Not the 176 claimed. The color is horrific compared to my other projector and is definitely not 720P. It is a little brighter and I'm going to guess maybe 600 ansi lumens, but there is nothing quiet about the fan. It is very loud. I can't imagine anyone watching movies on this and enjoying it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but here are some good to know key points...
customer_reviews.text: We couldnt get it to work with the wifi, so the "wireless" went out the window. We ended up using a usb thumb drive and it worked great. Started the movie at sundown, before it was even all the way dark. The brightness was impressive. Clarity was amazing. Sound was a little lacking, but I just hooked up speakers and it worked perfect. The sound would be fine if you were indoors, or you weren't surrounded by playing children. Definitely worth the money. It's going to work great at keeping the neighborhood kids together, & distracted after dark this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P Becerra

customer_reviews.title: 2nd projector doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this projector because of its WiFi compatibility. Turns out the original projector was defected. (No wifi signal) spike to customer service who had me trouble shoot and still no resolve. They sent me a return label and a replacement. I’m having the same issue with the replacement!! At this point I’d just like a refund. This has been frustrating to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Angie V.

customer_reviews.title: Good value - but be aware of restrictions
customer_reviews.text: The projector is good value for the price. The best use is when connected directly to another tv stick or Apple TV. There is a limitation that you can’t send any movies purchased in iTunes from a phone or tablet to this projector, due to the way the projector represents itself and iTunes rules. The restriction doesn’t seem to impact the smart tv devices. If you can workaround this hitch, you get a great little recreational or family projector.
customer_reviews.author: C. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector
customer_reviews.text: Projector arrived as promised. All pieces (cords, remote, lens cover and cleaning cloth) were all there. I was pleasantly surprised to find an actual printed user manual, which is so rare these days. It was pretty easy to set up to work with my laptop. I am a little disappointed that so far I have not been able to set up to work with my phone (Motorola Moto G7 To be fair, the manual says that Android phones are all different, and some settings may not be available on all phones. I will try to contact tech support for Motorola and/or for the projector when I have time.
customer_reviews.author: aglow59

customer_reviews.title: It works, would recommend with caveats!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it works! I disliked that it doesn’t really work by internet hook up and/or directions sucked for me lol. Liked that my Direct hookup to my Iphone was simple and works great. Disliked that it needs to be nearly black out conditions to see the pic. as minimal light washes it out easily and doesn’t project well on certain surfaces, really need a pull down screen or equivalent. Really Like the price and its size. With the caveats and because of the price I would still purchase as I have accommodated the issues by relocation in the house and adding a drop down screen for a theatre type viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Pedskr

customer_reviews.title: Super amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I did have trouble with set-up because the sound was terrible. Tried many different external speakers and still couldn't hear. I was so disappointed. Called customer service at 2300 and super nice fellow helped me fix it. We went through all the settings and then did a "factory reset". Never had trouble again and absolutely appreciate great customer service. I prefer external speakers because space I use is so large. Would absolutely suggest to others! My projector is set up in my new garage. One side is dedicated to my "theatre". I use 2 white sheets on the garage door. Now I have a theatre rain or shine, summer or winter with no bugs.
customer_reviews.author: surfer CA girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect projector for the perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my projector. It was such an easy set up connecting to my iPhone. When I realized that the apps such as Netflix, Hulu etc. Which also, this vendor does let you know ahead of time that the apps do not connect. I decided to switch to my Amazon Roku! Easy connection as well and it automatically worked! The picture quality is great! Sound is great! I am very pleased with this projector! Especially with the cost. I can’t wait to set it up in my backyard on my screen projector. Sorry no pic because I put it away so quickly after testing it. Trust that this is a great projector! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Replacement projector works great. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: This is a replacement projector that I received. The first one had a few glitches with the WiFi but their customer service was really great. They replaced my projector and offered me support. It connects to my WiFi now and I’m able to watch my videos. I give customer service 5 stars. The projector is pretty good, takes a little bit to connect but eventually connects. Overall it is a good projector. Does what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: SugarPieHoneyBunch:)

customer_reviews.title: Faded picture and glitches but easy airplay connection
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up to my iPhone which is great cause I could watch whatever I want but the more I use it the worst the picture is getting. The colors are sooooo faded and I’ve even tried changing the color settings but still sucks so bad! Also something new to note. When I watch something the movie will start to slow down and glitch a lot. Save your money and get a better one because I’ve had this for a couple weeks and it’s sucks more and more everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This was totally easy set up. It is perfect for an outdoor theater. We actually have it in our bedroom and then we are able to bring it outside for movie night. We found a projector screen at a yard sale and use that in our bedroom and then built two planters with 4x4 set in concrete and we put hooks on the 4x4's to hang the project screen outside. If you are outside you may want to attach a better speaker since sound travels But this is perfect for a bedroom. The picture quality is better than I anticipated and the projector is really easy to navigate. We use our amazon fire stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: The device itself doesn’t look like much, but the picture is sharp, bright, and vivid. The various types of setup can be mildly complicated, but be patient and follow the enclosed manual carefully. The most important thing to note is the phenomenal customer service. If you have any kind of problem, email them at the customer service email address provided in the manual. Responses are prompt, thorough, helpful, and generous. One of the best merchants I’ve dealt with on amazon. One quibble - I would wish the remote sensor could be placed where it would work for any angle. As it is, it seems to work only from one very specific angle from behind.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage quality picture. Not clear with any hint of light. Not easy to focus. The only selling point for me was the easy of use by streaming it directly from phone - this did not work well. The wifi option which is used to stream content would hang and would not recognise existing connection and does not allow to stream even after restarting. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Baymax

customer_reviews.title: super great product for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: loved it!! such an easy installation. pulled right out of the box, plugged into outlet, plugged Roku stick to the HDMI and USB port and that was it!! got to watching anything i wanted in less than 5minutes! easy focus and keynote adjuster too. for a mini projector the screen was big, i was expecting a problem with how far i was setting the projector up. the settings are easy to mess with it. it connected to WIFI really fast and it wasn’t a hassle trying to find the connective settings. the manual is very easy to read and straight forward. sooo excited for movie nights in the living room. such a great buy at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Al-Assi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for movie night in the yard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have movie night in our backyard. We have used it two nights in a row and really enjoy it. Obviously its not super high quality, but for the price and the purposes in which we need it, it works great. I really like that you can connect a phone or tablet through HDMI or by "casting". Speaker could definitely be louder, but we will just use external speakers instead. Connected to wifi no issues. Worked perfectly with our Roku. Good projector for the price, very good size if you want it to be portable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nevertell

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is a game changer for us. We have it set up in our room and our whole wall is now a movie screen. Last night all 4 of our kiddos piled into our room on blow up mattresses and we had a movie night watching Frozen 2. It was almost as good as being at the movies! Or even better since we were in pjs with our own pillows and blankets. Picture quality is amazing. The Hubby hooked the projector up to external speakers. It was awesome. Even our nightly viewings of The Office have turned into something special. We love this thing! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon from Florida

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good little projector
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this projector did exactly what I wanted it to. It's pretty bright with the lights on in the room (not bad, but I usually turn the lights down), the clarity is good - equivalent definition to my 10-year-old big screen TV which was cutting-edge HD when it was new. My only complaint is that the audio can sound a little "tinny" - I'm going to figure out how to get the audio to go to a speaker in the room. But also it was a projector under $100 bucks so I didn't expect insanely high-quality HD picture or audio. This is five stars for the price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Quiet While Streaming Movies
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly to stream movies for me and my kids. The picture is great (we’ve projected it on the wall and on a white shower curtain outside, about 4’x5’. The frustrating thing is that Disney+ & Netflix have settings on them that makes the sound SUPER quiet. We’ve had to crank an external speaker and it’s still just okay. There are other reviews that say you can turn the Dolby sound off, but I have yet to find that setting. :/ Otherwise, this works for my entertainment needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good projector
customer_reviews.text: The product is great for the price we are excited to use it. The WiFi reception is a little glitchy sometimes but when am close to the router it’s fine. Also tried running straight if DVD player and it works fine. The sound quality could delve better. On a quiet night with no wind blowing it’s a little hard to hear if you sit around 6 feet from the projector. Am not sure if it’s because we were sitting behind the projector but that’s how it sounded. Package was in great shape and very packable.
customer_reviews.author: Prithwiraj Ghosh Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We have an older projector, but purchased this one as it has WiFi capability, and it was on a lightening deal. We didn’t end up using the WiFi feature for our cul-de-sac movie night, but the projector itself is small, lightweight, and has great picture quality. We used additional Bluetooth speaker for sound. The sound on the projector itself would probably only be useful in a smaller area and not with a group of people.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried with some of the reviews but decided to give it a go! I’m sure glad I did! Any of the problems I had read about were easily explained or not a problem at all! The instructions are clear and very easy to follow. I am not tech savvy at all and I had it connected to my wifi and roku and up and running all within 30ish minutes! Very simple and so worth it. My image may not look clear on the video but it is. I’m also just projecting onto a white wall and it still comes out looking so clear! 100% a deal!!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Love the display. 7am in Los Angeles on popcorn walls. Sunrise hits bedroom window at 6am
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 9/30/19: 100" PVC Projector Screen: tHE SCREEN IN FRONT OF POPCORN WALL MAKES VIDEO BETTER BECAUSE YOU DON'T SEE THE SHADOWS FROM POPCORN. LOOKS NICE AND SMOOTH. unable to upload screen video for review. So far so good and this is with some sunlight coming through and on popcorn wall. Sound is from my Bluetooth speaker. Wireless connection works as well as hdmi to my Apple TV 4th generation. I have video and sound of fan to upload soon. Remote comes with batteries. I also have unboxing as well coming soon. Awesome packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, Just Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector, therefore I don't have much experience in the subject. However, I can say that this projector is above what I had expected, I was nervous about the quality because it is on the "affordable" side of the price range. So far I've ised it about 5-6 times using the HDMI option,, and has had no issues.. It was very easy to set up.. The quality is much better that I had anticipated, the image is clear and not blurry. The projector has an option to adjust the image focus. Overall, I would absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PixC

customer_reviews.title: Great features, price and cool image.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fist portable projector. After reviewing all the features, product reviews and the reasonable price, I decided to give the product a try. My family and I are very happy with the projector. With the days getting hot and due to the Covid-19 situation. We wanted to enjoy movie nights in our back yard. Movie nights have been great and we will definitely be taking advantage of the other feature that the projector offers (using it with the PS4 for game nights, watching Music videos, using with Karaoke, etc). :-)
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: This projector doesn't really have wifi capabilities as claimed by the seller
customer_reviews.text: Just wasted 2 hours of my life trying to setup wifi connection with the projector from a mobile device. Tried both Apple and Android. No luck whatsoever. I'm a technologically advanced person, I work for a software company. So no, it's not operator error. Projector is not streaming a WiFi connection to be able to support a wireless signal. So of you're ok with hooking it up via a cable - it's a good purchase. If you're looking for wifi connectivity (which is the out reason why I purchased it) - then don't waste your time on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent Home Projector
customer_reviews.text: We have been thinking about getting a home projector so we could watch Netflix or other movies in our renovated backyard so I have reviewed different products and gave a try on this one, and it has not disappointed me at all. Great quality for the price paid. I did get an Amazon Fire Stick so we can watch a whole set of subscribed and/or free medias. Clearly since this device is not designed for office presentation, the brightness is not as bright but I can still watch the free ABC News on our gray home-office wall. Pretty sure it would look much better on the proper, white screen that I am hoping to get sometimes soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: How cool is this tiny compact projector?! It’s everything you need in a handheld size and extremely reasonable price. It could easily cover 120 inch screen and is very clear. My only issue is trying to get the kiddos out from under it and go outside to play! My camera tripod fit perfectly with it and the compact size makes it easy to move from room to room or take outside. I can’t wait till it cools down and we can have a bonfire, s’mores and movie night under the stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pixelated
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written in horrible broken English. It was a bit difficult to finally connect via WiFi to my phone and once it did, I felt like it had turn my phone into a hi-def version of Minecraft. It was so pixelated even though this says it’s supposed to be 1080p. Had to return it. Also this is not truly “wireless” in the fullest sense of the word as it must be plugged in to operate. There is no internal battery.
customer_reviews.author: A. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the picture and sound of this projector. Given the extremely reasonable price, I was prepared for a mediocre viewing experience BUT that was not the case. I didn’t buy a screen so I used the side of my house and even that didn’t impact the color or picture. It was pretty easy to get up and running and I did find this projector works better wired so I connected to my WiFi, hooked up my Roku and had back to back outdoor movie nights. I did have to contact customer service for clarification on cleaning and the turnaround time for their response was less than 24 hours with easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: So, not being very tech-savy, I thought that it would take me a while to figure out how to work this projector. But the instructions are well written, and detailed, plus comes with pictures for every step! After 15 minutes of set-up, I had screen shared a Netflix movie onto the screen! Volume was good, clear audio. Picture was very clear and bright, once I removed the protective cap! Haha. I did say I wasn't tech-savy. But in the end, the product was well worth the money, and I would recommend this for my friends and family! Sarah C.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Collins

customer_reviews.title: Ok but only at a fixed distance
customer_reviews.text: Some issues connecting the wifi for mac connections, if your wifi requires username and password, it does not seem possible to enter both so Mac didn't connect through my work internet. Windows connection worked ok wirelessly with miracast. Larger issue is the lack of adjustability in screen size. The only way to increase/decrease screen is to move it physically which is hard if you have limited space. Overall very cheap though, and the picture is nice.
customer_reviews.author: dr. H

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but needs and extra speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this to watch movies on my deck. I haven't been able to use it outside yet but I used it in my basement. The picture quality is pretty good but I wish the speaker was louder. I just attached an external speaker and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Item I received was defective, company offered refund!
customer_reviews.text: Update: company selling item reached out to Let me know that item I received was defective and offered to send me a new one. Since I’ve already purchased another one they issued a full refund!! 👏🏻👏🏻 Great customer service!! Item doesn’t work. Purchased an additional cable from a local electronics store and still doesn’t work. Won’t sync video playback, only sound. I tried it in July when purchased and it didn’t work then. Assumed it was maybe because I was trying to cast the Dodger game.. fast forward to today and still doesn’t work. Will connect sound but not video. Won’t connect to zoom.. nothing! Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Romero

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a projector screen and I made a good choice when I purchased this projector very cost effective very good quality no problem so far I've been watching it on my wall because I don't have a screen I'm purchasing one soon but it looked just as good on my wall as it would on the screen I appreciate this projector and I recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Vernell Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at what I got
customer_reviews.text: I have done work for various night clubs, bars & other public stations and have had the pleasure to work with some of the highest and most expensive Projectors know. When my spouse ordered this product I didn't expect much & was so surprised at the picture quilty and brightness out of this tiny inexpensive unit. If you have a dark room and are just looking for something to use as a guest TV or Streaming unit I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gamingbysage

customer_reviews.title: Update!!! MUST Read!
customer_reviews.text: So I don't have batteries for the remote yet but basic set up was easy. My projector was a bit dusty and I can't seem to get this one spec off of one of the inside lenses even with the q-tips but no biggie. I primarily bought this for my bedroom and I just want a clear picture and it is and the sound is pretty good too. I'm happy with it. Update: I finally received my 100inch screen and a $30 refund for all the hassle just to get a free product. Customer service was really helpful, thanks Elsa
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Southern Jr.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect it to outperform projectors that cost 7 to 15 times as much, but for the money it gets the job done. Perfect for media presentations on the go. My girlfriend is an artist who designs maps for Renaissance Festivals and she uses it to prototype her work before sending it to the printer. For movies and TV, the speakers are a bit tinny but add a speaker set and it'll do just fine. You'll definitely want to be in a dark space and use a projector screen if possible for optimal experience. Setup was okay, the wifi is a little fiddly and I got the best performance with a wired connection.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Issues fixed! My daughters and I enjoyed watching "Power" last night with our Poyank projector. Easy mirroring to my Android and bluetooth to my Harmon. I had to chose between which to connect because my phone only allows one. So I connected the 3mm cord to the Harmon for my surround sound. This was better than being at the movies!! Picture was so sharp. We love it!! This is the one I orginally ordered for my daughter's Christmas gift. Now she has Dr. J and mom has Poyank. Basically the same but Poyank made my life easier. Thanks Poyank!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cuffeebychoice

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very impressed of the quality. I was very skeptical because of the lower price but I was basing my decision purely off the reviews. I’ve tested it out and was very happy with this decision. It was very simple to set up. I used both the hdmi connection and the ios Bluetooth. The iOS kept dropping but I cannot blame the projector totally as my phone tents to act up sometimes. Overall if you’re in the market for an economical projector I highly recommend. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This projector has affordable cost with decent screen quality. and wifi input is available Pro -Affordable cost: it is reasonable price with decent screen quality -Wifi input: Wifi input remove the hassle of cables. I am using Airplay (IOS) -Remocon: easy to use Con -Manual keyston: As manual keyston, adjust range is limited -User interface: all of them are easy to use for user interface but at the very first "language" settting. It is very not intuitive and I spend 10min to figuring out. I have to move arrow down to confirm and o.k. But rest of the user interface is all good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poyank projector ( great buy, solid product)
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the casual user. We have watched movies, played games on it. Projector doesn't get too hot after extended use due to its internal fan moving constant cool air. The remote that comes with it is good quality and the buttons actually click nicely giving a positive feedback. Projector connected easily to our WiFi network and Android devices. The speaker on it is decent. Could use a little more bass. Overall we are happy with our purchase and will continue to enjoy our projector.
customer_reviews.author: Johnattan V

customer_reviews.title: Be aware does not work on iOS devices
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this a one star because it does not work on any of my iOS devices as it states. Only works on my daughters pc computer. Gives me a licensing error on all Of our iPads and iPhones, very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for remote learning!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for kid’s remote learning. Very easy to set up. Tried connection to iPad with WiFi and usb cable. Both work! Please know you do not need a HDMI Cable to connect iPad and protector. I bought a HDMI cable and it happened to be a bad one. Then I read the instruction and figured that I do not need it anyway. For a wired connection, you can just use your iPad charging cable. The projector is an essential piece if you want vision protection when kids have remote learning.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: There are lot of projectors to choose from and we bought this one to give it a shot based on the research and reviews we have gathered. Easy to setup ( able to connect on the iPhone, iPad via wireless) Pictures are clear Sounds are fine. Don’t expect Bose quality. Loud enough to hear from a far distance. Perfect for outdoor movie night. Our 4 year old loves it. You can do Netflix, Amazon prime to watch Shows, but not movies via the wireless setup. To watch movies, you will either need one of those Adaptors or use an Amazon firestick (like us). Overall, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: No buyers remorse this time!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. The nerves get a little jumpy when buying some items online, and this one had me stressing. All for not! Great little machine. Turned my little space away from the family into a theater room in about 15 mins, and most of that time was spent looking for something to watch. Firestick and chill was the theme of the evening, but on a larger scale. 55in. TV was made small by this big screen (no screen yet, wall worked great though). Weather has us indoors for a while. But as soon as weather permits.. Movie night in the yard is gonna be epic.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll G. White

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product because of the reviews. Turns out it works great on our stay at home backyard camp during COVID 19. The volume is not good needs a speaker due to the sound being low. Picture was great but next time I will order a screen because any white sheet or wall was not good enough. Easy to install and use with my cell or local cable TV company.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Projector!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little projector. Great picture quality. Sound from the projector is surprisingly better than I expected. Initial setup was easy and now when I want to use it, it takes a few seconds and it’s ready to use. I currently use it to watch sports and movies on my patio. It works great on a tripod as it’s lightweight. I’m also a teacher and I know that this will come in handy in my classroom as well. Would definitely recommend this as an inexpensive projector.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela E. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Melting remote.
customer_reviews.text: I just inboxed my projector to use at a party today. Got everything set up, went to use the remote and dropped it when it was hot enough to burn my hand. The remote was melting. The picture from the projector looks good but what in the world?!?
customer_reviews.author: Crtoe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little projector that delivers a great quality picture. Purchased this with the intent to create movies in the backyard and it surpassed my expectations. I connected a Roku directly to the projector via HDMI and I was up and running in about 15 minutes. We enjoyed our first makeshift drive-in the same night that item was delivered. For the price point of this little projector I am more than satisfied with the quality that it delivers and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor movies or projecting for group entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: This projector was better than we expected. For the price, it was amazing! The remote worked well, brightness was good, and picture quality was above what we expected. The picture wasn’t extremely hi-def, but did the job. If you’re looking for a projector for a fancy home theater, this isn’t the one for you. If you’re looking for a projector for outdoor movies, or to portably display entertainment - this is fantastic. Great value for the money. I would have given 5 stars but the built in speaker was not great. We connected our JBL portable speaker with a headphone jack cord and that solved the sound problem.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMom&Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality, but not much else
customer_reviews.text: Image picture and quality are VERY good. Main problem is the screen size and angle is directly in relation to how far the projector is from wall. A lot of projectors let you adjust screen size and angle from any distance or position. So rather than putting the projector anywhere I want it has to be angled and distanced exactly in the right position from the screen. Just harder to set up. Also this one does NOT have bluetooth for audio, needs to be hardwired. I knew that when purchased but I didnt realize the audio it came with would be so weak.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because it had been on my vision board of things I wanted. I had this vision of my family and friends gathered outside under the starts watching a movie. Well we got close. Had our yard filled with all the kids in the neighborhood. Giggling and laughing while watching a move. Made my heart so happy. The product was easy to use! Picture quality was great and sound output was AMAZING. I was very much impressed!
customer_reviews.author: B&M Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Big projector in a small package!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the small priced unit, so I immediately tested it, expecting to be let down. This little projector worked great!! We watched the green mile, so it was working for over two hours straight and was flawless. We also go the cloth projection screen and it made a huge difference in the picture quality, although I did use the garage wall for a test and the picture was still pretty strong without the screen.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs :)
customer_reviews.text: 720 Native Resolution, under $100. Clear picture. Bright. Many connection options. First picture is my camera, the picture from the projector is bright. Picture was taken during the day! Still bright enough to watch! It was an overcast day, so don't expect a miracle. Sound is great, loud but not earth shattering. I am very happy with this putchase (so far) and would 10/10 recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Einnovoeg

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!!  Good product!
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered this projector for our art studio, for some reason, it was projecting a mirror image reflection! But we still used it, without trying to fix it, until I was reached out by the customer service representative to review their product. After, Elsa found out that i am not 100% happy, she offered to replace it. Without even waiting for me to send back the first one, she sent me the new one. I got it today, checked it and it works great! Everything works perfect and a it projects a good image! I am really impressed and happy with this customer care! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: yael lichaa

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. Quality audio and video.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purpose of this projector. The many great reviews was the reason I went with this brand. Setup was simple and even projecting onto the wall the image was bright, colorful, and clear. The built-in speakers were great quality. No need to hookup additional audio speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B Green

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice for an realtively inexpensive projector that has streaming capabilities
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector to use for Halloween special effect casting of digitally created ghosts/ghouls and needed a good way to stream from my tablet or phone for ease of daily setup. This projector did the trick, while not the brightest or most color accurate one around, the price point on this and the WiFi feature definitely make this a strong contender when you are looking to not invest in a "cinema" or "theater" type projector you would want to formally setup in your home. I'd say this would be great for kids and gaming (assuming they are not overly picky about picture/color accuracy).
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Shopper Elite

customer_reviews.title: frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was the most frustrating thing i’ve ever bought on amazon. first it wouldn’t pick up my wifi signal so i had to get a new wifi router. finally it connects then it won’t connect to my phone? i read somewhere that a roku plugged into the hdmi port would work so i coughed up another 40$ for one and connected. It since then has been easy to use but had i known it was going to be that frustrating is spent a little extra on a better product. i have 3 stars cause it does work but be prepared to run into some issues.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, may need to be a wired connection.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice unit. Small and easy to use. I haven't tried it on a big screen yet, so cannot vouch for picture quality on a largw scale. I bought it for display pictures and slideshows and it's working great for that It is a little loud, but not louder than others I have used. Wireless casting seems to be a problem to set up, at least for me. I tried on 3 different devices... Got 1 to work briefly and then not again.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Eavou

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi is hard to set up but it’s a good little projector.
customer_reviews.text: I received my product on Saturday so far I like it the Wi-Fi is a little bit complicated to set up because they want you to use your phone or computer and every time I try to go on a browser it won’t let you use the Wi-Fi him the picture is nice but you can have a fire stick to it so that makes it great. And they possibly could some batteries ago in the remote control those are my only complaint. I will put up a video later time since I had a screen delivered
customer_reviews.author: Anthony and Brandy M.

customer_reviews.title: So happy we purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worked really well. Sound was good but we did use a cable to connect to a near by external speaker. Manual was great at identifying the distance the projector should be from the screen for the perfect quality. Here are some images of the projector in use with lights on and off under a tent. We did not use the remote but it’s a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son to have a gamer birthday party. This way everyone playing can see well. It's perfect for our needs. Company kept their word and sent me a projector screen absolutely free. It arrived over a month later but it's amazing and the picture is better with it. We took our tv out of our room and replaced it with this!!! We even hooked our fire stick to it. Best purchase for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Brown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AND GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I was hoping it was! We love watching movies on our large wall at nights. The quality and brightness were great and the size was perfect! Customer service always replied back. Wifi is strong and automatically connects every time you turn it on. Best part is that it connects to our Firestick so we can use it with any streaming app. My only reservation is that I wish the sound was louder and more clear but I'm just being picky at this point.
customer_reviews.author: jeanetics

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: They have came up with a great product at a reasonable price which is also very simple to use. Especially with the new way of living with the Covid epidemic, it has provided my family and I a new way to experience movies in our backyard. Thank you. Now we just need a bigger screen to watch movies on. We have a white fence which can make for easy viewing and fast setup as well if needed. Happy with purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Decent value at this price point
customer_reviews.text: It's not going to blow you away, but it does the trick. Sounds isn't great (but you can easily add a 3mm externally wired speaker). Brightness isn't bad, but it's not going to suffice for any daytime showings. Overall I think it represents a decent value for an easy to use outside movie experience.
customer_reviews.author: BMannMe

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today after doing loads of research on an affordable option with wifi capabilities. My desire for wifi capability was to screen share my iphone/ipad for Netflix and Hulu. Upon setting up the device I realized I wasn't able to--but was pleasantly surprised to see an explanation as to why in the instruction manual (something to do with copyright issues through those streaming apps). I have no issues sharing those through my laptop using a traditional HDMI cord. Can't wait to try this out outside in the coming weeks. A great addition to my pandemic lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: artis630

customer_reviews.title: Netflix casting issues
customer_reviews.text: I been trying to cast a Netflix and have two different problems: Android device: sounds and subtitles are shown perfectly but there's no video and in my phone looks fine. IOS device: remains loading and never shows image or sound and then gets disconnected from screen mirroring. I hope you can really help me out with this because I bought it to watch Netflix in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Estefanía Hernández

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this projector. Im not very techno (as you can tell by my sideways picture) & I was able to follow the easy instructions to connect to wifi, use with firestick, netflix & screen mirroring from my android. Picture is of projecting movie onto siding of house. I didn't even need to hang a screen!
customer_reviews.author: MadameM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time, and was simple to set up. I tried it first with a PC to watch a DVD, then with my phone to watch a video on YouTube. The sound quality was ok, but then I hooked it up to better speakers and the experience was better than expected. Pros: -portable -easy to set up -small, so if you ever have to move, you’re not lugging a giant TV screen around. Cons: -you’ll need your own HDMI cable to connect your computer to the projector -the vertical adjustment feature for the screen could use a longer screw (but a small book also does the trick just as well)
customer_reviews.author: A Child Passenger Safety Tech & Instructor

customer_reviews.title: A good entry level projector
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got it as a gift and i was pleasantly surprised with the performance of this. This is a small projector but it gets bright enough and picture quality is as good as some other high end Projectors. I am very satisfied with this and have already used multiple times as it is very easy to setup and get up and running. Please do remember to start the projector in little bit advance as it takes a little bit for it to warm up. Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: Samidog10

customer_reviews.title: First projector
customer_reviews.text: Attached is my amazon review for the projector I will start by saying I am not a very techy person. This projector was so easy to set up. Take it out of the box, and box it, connect to Wi-Fi, and you’re ready to go. Connected to my iPhone and to my MacBook. My 14-year-old can set it up as well. It is a great projector with a great price. Very happy with my first projector purchase.!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Everson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for . . .
customer_reviews.text: I could connect to WiFi but then mirroring would not work on iPad, iPhone, or Android phone. In fact, I could not connect via USB either. HDMI cable worked but I bought this for mirroring from the iPad and iPhone. Screen resolution was poor also. I should have know that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Happy farmer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a projector for outdoor movie nights, but did not want to spend a fortune. After reading other reviews, this one seemed worth a shot. We tested it out within an hour of receiving it and it does not disappoint. The image was taken indoors and not even in a completely dark room. Definitely a great projector for the price Edited to add: we have since used this for multiple outdoor movie nights and indoor movie nights. We hooked up some old computer speakers we had lying around for our outdoor movie nights. The built in speaker is great for indoors, but it was easy enough to connect to our bluetooth surround system.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture for the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away by the quality and ease of use for this projector. Hooked up a small guitar amp, but the built-in speaker actually even works pretty well. Added a DVD player and Roku box for complete entertainment experience. I did not try the network connection, but used all the others with no issues. Have yet to experience any overheating even after 4+ hours of use at a time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Frohm

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching and this seemed like the best quality for the price point. My only complaint is that the image is slightly crooked, (I dropped it about 20 minutes after use and I think this caused the problem.) but it's easily fixed with a piece of paper folded underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but faulty WiFi
customer_reviews.text: The picture is good and it’s pretty easy to use but I cannot get it to connect to WiFi and this can’t use the screen mirroring function on my iPhone 11 so that’s a major bummer. The cord is also short so you likely need an extension cord. I think I’m going to keep it because it’s working well with my firestick and with the HDMI connection to my Dell laptop but none of the other connectivity is working for me so I probably could have gotten a cheaper model. Also the speakers are loud but I prefer the sound with an external speaker. Keep in mind no Bluetooth so you need aux cord connection.
customer_reviews.author: LMCG

customer_reviews.title: Movie night fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s easy to set up and has great picture quality. We love movie nights on our patio with it. We bought a cheap screen and built a frame for it. We like the volume louder than the projector gets so we connect our laptop (which is the device we’ve been connecting to the projector) to a speaker for a louder sound.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to set up. It powers up very quickly as well which is nice! I will say the fan is a little noisy in quiet settings and you're definitely going to wanna use this in a very dark room with a projector screen for the best image. but I'm sure the noise won't matter when my speakers are turned up and I'm watching a good movie! Overall im satisfied with this product. Started up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shaman Mnyambo

customer_reviews.title: So far impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nice color & brightness...easy hook to home wifi...Iphone with cable casts easily...HDMI hook up from laptop very easy & will display Netflix & Amazon Prime via this method...audio can be pulled off of the projector to an external speaker / working to set up a nice external audio...& still working on Android screen cast... So far, used it...it works as described...will be putting it to a lot of use this weekend...will update if necessary...so far, for the price it has impressed.
customer_reviews.author: NWM

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive good deal for prime day
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. I haven't used it yet on the screen just on the wall but the picture seems good. Not sure how long the unit will last but it seems good now. Sound is OK for a entry level projector. You can use other speakers but I haven't tried this yet. Most important thing that I found is that if you want to use netflix or other services the easiest method is a streaming stick added to the HDMI port. I have an android phone and I had some difficulty with that but a stick makes it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is HORRIBLE! I got it out for the second time to use and the sound does not work! I stored it in its original packaging inside my home. No damage has been done to it and it has just stopped working! I don’t typically write reviews but this is NOT worth your money - which they will not refund to me!
customer_reviews.author: Jim D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: The price was a mid-range price with great ratings. I do a lot of research (sometimes too much), but this projector was getting good reviews. We plugged it in and set up the firestick and it worked really well. The only reason it isn't getting 5 stars was because of the mirroring feature for cell phones. Not necessarily their fault, but you can't view any Netflix, Hulu or Amazon from one device to another. So use the firestick directly in the projector. It works great, and you can show anything from any of the previous viewing sites.
customer_reviews.author: papagorgio9

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas he hasn’t used it bc we were never able to get it connected to his android phone. I pulled it out today and was able to get it connected but it will only play YouTube and no other app. Complete waste of time and $ and not sure what to even do with it now. We’ve watched every video there is to try and figure it out with no luck
customer_reviews.author: Alexis McRaney

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Lens was foggy and dusty right out of the box, picture quality is not very good, speakers are terrible(wasn't counting on them since i have sound system), and casting does not work too well. I chose this one cause it was on the cheaper side but i should have went with a higher quality brand. Due to foggy lens it impacts acreen quality big time and im now noticing. Upsetting. Probably will return.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

product_meta.title: [2020 Upgrade WiFi Projector] POYANK 4500Lux LED WiFi Projector, Full HD 1080P Supported Mini Projector, [Native 720P] Compatible with Smartphones, PS4, TV Box, HDMI, USB, AV for Home Entertainment
feature_bullets: 📱 THE MOST POPULAR WIRELESS WIFI PROJECTOR: After deep research on the market, we noticed lots of our customers would like to deliver the smartphone screen to projector for a big display view experience. Today, Poyank WIFI Projector has perfectly solved the MHL connection issues now. By using our WIFI projector, you don’t need to order the variety of adapters anymore!

📱 HOW TO PROJECT Smartphone TO BIG DISPLAY? ① You can set up the WIFI settings in the projector and connect your smartphone with our projector directly. ② You can also use the original USB cable to connect your Smartphone to our projector directly. All in all, easy operation!

📱 WHAT ABOUT FOR ANDROID DEVICE? Although different Android devices vary, you can still use our POYANK WIFI projector to project your mobile screen to big display if your phone supports the Multi-media or Project Screen function. How wonderful it is!

📱 2020 Latest Upgrade Brightness & Resolution: POYANK Wireless projector has upgraded the native resolution to 1280x720, and it can also support the highest resolution of 1920*1080. At the same time, our technical department also improved 20%+ of the brightness. The aspect ratio is 16:9/4:3, with 2000:1 contrast ratio. The lamp life is up to 50,000 hours. The display size is 32”- 176” at the distance of 1.2M-5M.

📱 THE BEST CHOICE FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR HOME ENTERTAINMENT - Poyank WIFI projector is ideal choice for your indoor and outdoor movie or video games needs. Mounting to ceiling is also supported. We recommend our customers to use it in dark to get the best image quality. Do not recommend for presentations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,550 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
